Prim Touch 30

The Coolest Tower Air Cooler

India's first innovative cooler range

Prim Touch 30 air cooler range boasts innovative set of features. It includes a unique fan design for low noise cooling, collapsible louvers to prevent dust and insects from entering the air cooler, ice chamber for instant chilled air, and auto fill setup for continuous water supply. High-performance and easy maintenance are other top capabilities of Celia series.

Strong Air Delivery

Air delivery of 3500 m³/h assures effective cooling of air even in larger areas.Air delivery of 3500 m³/h assures effective cooling of air even in larger areas.

Fully Collapsible Louvers

It prevents dust and insects from entering inside the air cooler.

Warranty

1 Year
